Report.Name: Top Devices by System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window

Report.Name: Top Devices by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6

Report.Name: Top STMs by Uptime Pct (Achieved Application SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks Synthetic transaction monitor tests (STM) by achieved uptime over a time window

Report.Name: Top STMs by Business Hours Uptime Pct (Achieved Application SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks Synthetic transaction monitor tests (STM) by achieved uptime over a time window

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_EUM_STATUS" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6

Report.Name: Top Devices by Accumulated System Downtime
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total system downtime over a window

Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total system downtime during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6

Report.Name: Top Devices by Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by network ping uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,hostIpAddr,SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Network Ping Downtime", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Network Ping Uptime (SLA)", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

Report.Name: Top Devices by Business Hours Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by network uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6

Report.Name: Top Devices by Accumulated Network Ping Downtime
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total network ping downtime over a window

Report.Name: Top Devices by Accumulated Network Ping Downtime During Business Hours
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total network ping downtime during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6

Report.Name: Top Trace Route Hops by RTT
Report.Description: This report ranks trace route hops by average hop by hop RTT

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications By Bytes (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by bytes

SelectClause.AttrList: appName,appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, SUM(totBytes), SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks applications by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications By Received Bps
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by received bits per second

SelectClause.AttrList: appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(recvBitsPerSec), AVG(sentBitsPerSec)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Conversations By Bytes (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application conversations by bytes

SelectClause.AttrList: appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, ipProto, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, destIpPort, SUM(totBytes), SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes)

SubPattern.name: Filter_AVC_3
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, ipProto, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, destIpPort

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Sources By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks Application Connection Sources by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Conversations By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks Connections and Applications by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application Conversations By Received Bps
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application conversations by received bits per second

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, AVG(recvBitsPerSec), AVG(sentBitsPerSec), appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, ipProto, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, destIpPort

SubPattern.name: Filter_AVC_4
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, ipProto, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, destIpPort

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application Groups By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application groups by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application Groups By Received Bps
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application groups by received bits per second

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application Category By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application category by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application Category By Received Bps
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application category by received bits per second

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application SubCategory By Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application subcategory by bytes

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Application SubCategory By Received Bps
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC application subcategory by received bits per second

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with slowest server response times
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by slowest average server response times. Server response time is the time taken by an application to respond to a request. It is also called Application Delay (AD) or Application Response Time.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageServerResponseTime), MIN(serverResponseTimeMin), MAX(serverResponseTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with slowest end-user application transaction times
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by slowest average end-user application transaction times. The amount of time between the client request and the final response packet from the server. It is measured and exported on receiving either a new request from client, which indicates end of current transaction, or the first FIN packet.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageTransactionTime), MIN(totalTransactionTimeMin), MAX(totalTransactionTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with slowest end-user application response times
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by slowest average end-user application response times. Response time is the amount of time between the Client TCP request and the first server response.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageResponseTime), MIN(responseTimeMin), MAX(responseTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with highest network time
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by higherst average network times. It is also called Network Delay (ND). The round trip time from client to server that is the summation of client network delay and server network delay.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageNetworkTime), MIN(networkTimeMin), MAX(networkTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with highest client network time
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by highest average client network times. The round trip time between SYN-ACK & ACK and also called Client Network Delay (CND).

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageClientNetworkTime), MIN(clientNetworkTimeMin), MAX(clientNetworkTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications with highest server network time
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by highest average server network times. The round trip time between SYN & SYN-ACK and also called Server Network Delay (SND).

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, AVG(averageServerNetworkTime), MIN(serverNetworkTimeMin), MAX(serverNetworkTimeMax)

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications by number of late responses > 1 second
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number of late responses which is the number of responses received after the max response time of 1 second (timeout period).

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, SUM(ARTCountLateResponses), SUM(ARTCountResponses), SUM(ARTCountLateResponses)*100/SUM(ARTCountResponses), appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications by number of responses 100ms - 1 second
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number of responses received between 100ms and 1second.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket7), SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket6), SUM(ARTCountResponses), appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications by number of responses 10ms - 100ms
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number of responses received between 10ms and 100ms.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket5), SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket4), SUM(ARTCountResponses), appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications by number of responses < 10ms
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number of responses received in less than 10ms.

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket3), SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket2), SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket1), SUM(ARTCountResponses), appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName

OrderByClause.AttrList: SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket3) DESC, SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket2) DESC, SUM(ARTCountResponsesHistogramBucket1) DESC

Report.Name: AppFlow: Top Applications by number of QoS Queue drops
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number QoS queue packet drops. Queue drops can affect one or more flows mapped to the affected Queue

SelectClause.AttrList: nbarApplicationId, appName, SUM(qosQueueDrops), qosQueueId, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName

SubPattern.name: Filter_AVC_21
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: nbarApplicationId, appName, appCategory, appSubcategory, appGroupName, qosQueueId

Report.Name: Top QoS Classes by Packet Drop
Report.Description: Ranks Cisco AVC applications by number QoS queue packet drops. Queue drops can affect one or more flows mapped to the affected Queue

SelectClause.AttrList: qosClassId, AVG(totPktDrop) "Drops", AVG(totBytes) "Bytes", AVG(currentBandwidth) "Current Bw",MAX(peakBandwidth) "Peak Bw",AVG(allocatedBandwidth) "Allocated Bw"

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 servers by CPU util (via AWS SDK)
Report.Description: Ranks Amazon EC2 servers by CPU utilization - metrics collected via AWS SDK

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 servers by Disk I/O (via AWS SDK)
Report.Description: Ranks Amazon EC2 servers by disk I/O activity - metrics collected via AWS SDK

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 servers by network traffic (via AWS SDK)
Report.Description: Ranks Amazon EC2 servers by network traffic activity - metrics collected via AWS SDK

Report.Name: Logon: AWS EC2 Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked)

Report.Name: Logon: Top AWS EC2 Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked)

Report.Name: All Events: Top AWS EC2 Windows Reporting Servers By Event Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers by the total number of events sent

Report.Name: Logon: Privileged AWS EC2 Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Remote Desktop Connections to AWS EC2 Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: AWS EC2 Windows Server Logons
Report.Description: This report captures all logons (sucessful and failed) to windows servers

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Change: AWS EC2 Windows Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange)

Report.Name: Logon: AWS EC2 Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked)

Report.Name: Change: AWS EC2 Windows Audit Policy Changes
Report.Description: This report captures audit policy changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-807","Win-Security-4902","Win-Security-517","Win-Security-612","Win-Security-4912","Win-Security-4715","Win-Security-4907")

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 Windows Servers By Memory Util and swap rate
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization and swap rate

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 Windows Servers By Disk I/O Latency
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DISK_IO_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 Windows Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: AWS EC2 Windows Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks windows servers by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: AWS EC2 Windows Hardware Errors
Report.Description: Captures Windows hardware warning and critical errors. Supported hardware includes Dell and HP

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HwProblem)

Report.Name: Availability: AWS EC2 Windows Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: AWS EC2 Windows Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppRestart) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: Top AWS EC2 Windows Servers by Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by system uptime

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: AWS EC2 Windows Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

SubPattern.name: Filter_SRVC_UPDOWN
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_PROC_START","PH_DEV_MON_PROC_STOP") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Change: AWS EC2 Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventAction = 1

Report.Name: Change: AWS EC2 Windows File Access Successes
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access successes. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventAction = 0

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 Windows servers by page file usage
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average page file usage over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_PAGEFILE_USAGE" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top AWS EC2 Windows Applications By CPU, Memory
Report.Description: Ranks Windows processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Activity: Successful AWS EC2 Linux Servers Privileged Command Executions
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege command escalations (sudo) count

Report.Description: This report captures EC2 Configuration changes

Report.Name: CloudTrail: Top Events
Report.Description: This report captures top AWS CloudTrail events

Report.Name: Inbound Firewall Permitted TCP/UDP Port Usage Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baseline of permitted inbound TCP/UDP port usage. The data is reported by firewall logs. For every inbound destination port and protocol combination, the total number of unique sources, destinations and the total bytes and flows are reported

SelectClause.AttrList: profDateType, hourOfDay, ipProto,destIpPort, avgDistinctSrcIpAddr, avgDistinctDestIpAddr, avgTotFlows, avgTotBytes,sdevTotFlows,sdevTotBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Outbound Firewall Permitted TCP/UDP Port Usage Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baseline of permitted outbound TCP/UDP port usage.The data is reported by firewall logs.For every outbound destination port and protocol combination, the total number of unique sources, destinations and the total bytes and flows are reported

SelectClause.AttrList: profDateType, hourOfDay, ipProto,destIpPort, avgDistinctSrcIpAddr, avgDistinctDestIpAddr,avgTotFlows, avgTotBytes,sdevTotFlows,sdevTotBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Inbound Firewall Denied TCP/UDP Port Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baseline of denied inbound TCP/UDP port usage.The data is reported by firewall logs. For every port, the number of denied attempts and the number of distinct source and destination ip addresses are profiled.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgMatchedEvents DESC

Report.Name: Outbound Firewall Denied TCP/UDP Port Usage
Report.Description: This report provides baseline of denied outbound TCP/UDP port usage.The data is reported by firewall logs. For every port, the number of denied attempts and the number of distinct source and destination ip addresses are profiled.

Report.Name: Firewall Denied Aggregate Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This profile captures the amount of denied traffic and the distinct ports on a per firewall basis.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgMatchedEvents DESC

Report.Name: Device CPU, Memory Usage Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baselines cpu, memory usage profile

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgCpuUtil DESC

Report.Name: Device Disk I/O Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baselines disk I/O usage for servers, VMs and ESX

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgDiskReadKBytesPerSec DESC

Report.Name: Network Interface Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baselines for network interface traffic

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgSentBytes64 DESC

Report.Name: Network Interface Error Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baselines network interface errors and discards

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgInIntfPktErr DESC

Report.Name: Firewall Connection Count Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baseline of permitted firewall connection count

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgFwConnCount DESC

Report.Name: DNS Request Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines DNS requests on a per client basis: the number of requests and distinct destinations it attempted to resolve.

Report.Name: DNS Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines DNS traffic characteristics on a per client basis: sent and receive bytes and packets.

Report.Name: ICMP Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This report baseline client ICMP traffic: number of ICMP packets and number of distinct destinations

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgMatchedEvents DESC

Report.Name: Successful Logon Profile
Report.Description: This report baseline successful logon activity at a host

Report.Name: Reporting EPS Profile
Report.Description: This report baseline reported event rate per device

Report.Name: Server Process Count profile
Report.Description: This report baselines the number of processes running at a server.

Report.Name: Privileged Logon Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines privileged logons at a server

Report.Name: Reported Event Type Profile
Report.Description: This report provides baselines for distinct event types reported by a device

Report.Name: Reported Error Log Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines the number of errors reported in logs on a per device basis

Report.Name: Failed User Logon Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines failed user logons at a host

Report.Name: STM Response Time Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines Synthetic Transaction Monitoting response times.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgAppResponseTimeMSec DESC

Report.Name: Ping Response Time Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines Ping response times.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgAvgDurationMSec DESC

Report.Name: SNMP Response Time Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines SNMP response times.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgAvgDurationMSec DESC

Report.Name: WMI Response Time Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines WMI response times.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgAvgDurationMSec DESC

Report.Name: Source Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines traffic generated by a source. The data is reported by network flow (Netflow, Sflow) and firewall logs.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDateType, hourOfDay, srcIpAddr, avgDistinctDestIpAddr, avgDistinctDestIpPort, avgTotFlows, avgTotBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Destination Traffic Profile
Report.Description: This report baselines traffic destined to a server. The data is reported by network flow (Netflow, Sflow) and firewall logs.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDateType ASC, hourOfDay ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_INST_SW") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Devices By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Devices By Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Devices By Disk Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Firewalls By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Device Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the devices and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Server Processes By CPU, Mem Util
Report.Description: Ranks the server processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top Network Device Processes By CPU, Mem Util
Report.Description: Ranks the host processes by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: Top App Servers By CPU Usage With Other Performance Metrics
Report.Description: Ranks App servers by the amount of CPU usage - this report provides details on other performance aspects such as memory, threads and classes

SelectClause.AttrList: reptDevIpAddr,AVG(cpuUtil),MAX(cpuUtil), AVG(heapUtil),MAX(heapUtil), AVG(nonHeapUtil),MAX(nonHeapUtil), AVG(liveThreads), MAX(liveThreadsMax), AVG(loadedClasses)

Report.Name: COBIT DS3.x: All devices under performance monitoring
Report.Description: Captures all devices under performance monitoring

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Network Device Down/Restart

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Network Device Failover
Report.Description: Tracks network device failovers

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Failover) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Network Device Interface Down/Up

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Network Device License Expiry

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Application License Expiry
Report.Description: Tracks application license expiry events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Network Device Link Module Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device miscellaneous module (e.g. fan, power etc.) down/up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_OtherModuleDown) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Top Network Devices, Errors By Count
Report.Description: Ranks network devices by reported error count

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Top Devices by Accumulated Downtime
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total system downtime over the last week

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Top Devices by System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window

Report.Name: COBIT DS4.x: Top Devices by Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by network ping uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,hostIpAddr,SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Network Ping Downtime", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Network Ping Uptime (SLA)", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

Report.Name: COBIT AI2.4,DS4.x: Top Applications By Response Time
Report.Description: Ranks the services by average application level probe response times

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Domain Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on domain accounts. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730", "Win-Security-4753","Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Global Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Unix Users Added To Group
Report.Description: Tracks user additions to groups

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType = "Generic_Unix_User_Add") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.4: Unix User Password Changed
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Successful Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Failed Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.5: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.6: Top Incidents Ranked By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the incidents by first their severity and then by their count.

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.6: All Availability Incidents
Report.Description: Captures the availability incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_AVAIL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.6: Performance Incidents
Report.Description: Captures the performance related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_PERF) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.6: Security Incidents
Report.Description: Captures the security related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_SEC) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate Spyware found on a device Host Anti-virus solutions failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Top Hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures hosts with malware found by host anti-virus solutions

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Top Hosts with Malware Found By Network IPS and Firewalls
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Top Hosts with Malware Found By Antivirus and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.9: Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NoncompliantHost) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewalls and Permitted Outbound Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewalls and Permitted Inbound Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewalls and Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewalls and Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewalls and Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Blocked Internal Destinations, Services Ranked By Connection Count
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Destinations, Services Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Network IPS events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network IPS events by count

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Network Scanners By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses by detected network scan or reconnaissance events

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Reconn) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Blocked Network Attacks By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network attacks blocked by network IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Web Users By Uncommon HTTP Method Connections
Report.Description: Ranks web users by uncommon HTTP methods used

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND httpMethod NOT IN ("GET", "POST") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Web Users By HTTP POST Exchanged Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks web clients by HTTP POST byte count - can catch malware sending confidential information out

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND httpStatusCode IN ("200") AND httpMethod = "POST" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Visited Web Sites And Categories By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks (successfully) visited web sites and categories by the number of connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Denied Web Sites And Categories By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks web sites and categories that were denied by policy, by the number of connections

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Web Users, Denied Sites And Categories By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks users, web sites and categories that were denied by policy, by the number of connections

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Filtered Inbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total inbound spam denied by spam filtering policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_18
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Filtered Outbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total outbound spam denied by policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Total Denied Web Connections By Policy
Report.Description: Counts denied web site connections because of policy violations

Report.Name: COBIT DS5.10: Top Mail Security Gateway Actions By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the actions taken by the mail security gateway - actions include blocking an inbound/outbound mail gateway because of RBL or other SMTP violations, blocking a mail because of spam or other policy violations and delivering a mail

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS9.x: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS9.x: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between firewall running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS9.x: Router Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between router running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: COBIT DS9.x: Router/Switch Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Database Server Logon Details
Report.Description: Captures successful database server logons for SQL Server, Oracle and MySQL database servers.

Report.Name: Logon: Top Database Users By Successful Logons
Report.Description: Ranks database users by the number of successful logons for SQL Server, Oracle and MySQL database servers.

Report.Name: Logon: Top Database Users By All Logon Activity

Report.Name: Top Internal DNS Servers By Requests Served
Report.Description: Ranks the internal DNS servers by requests served. A DNS is internal if it is in a private address space.

Report.Name: Top DNS Requesters By Requests
Report.Description: Ranks the IP addresses making DNS queries by the total number of requests. DNS servers are expected to show up at the top followed by other end hosts. User machines making a large number of DNS queries are suspect.

Report.Name: Top Queried Domain Names
Report.Description: Ranks the queried domain names by the number of name resolution requests

Report.Name: Top DNS Query Types
Report.Description: Top DNS query types

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_")

Report.Name: Top DNS Requesters, DNS Servers By Uncommon DNS Query Count
Report.Description: Ranks IP addresses making uncommon DNS queries and the DNS servers by the total count of such queries. Any DNS query other than A and PTR query is considered uncommon

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_") AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_CommonDNSTraffic)

Report.Name: Top DNS Requesters and Resolved Names By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the DNS requesters and the host for whom DNS service is requested by the total number of requests.

Report.Name: Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

Report.Name: DNS Ports Up/Down
Report.Description: Tracks DNS ports that went up or down

Report.Name: Top DNS Servers By Response Time
Report.Description: Ranks the DNS Servers by average application level probe response times

Report.Name: Top DNS Server Processes by Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks the windows applications (processes) by application uptime

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "Microsoft DNS") OR (appName CONTAIN "Bind DNS"))

Report.Name: Top DNS Zones By Successful Queries

Report.Name: Change: Domain Account Lock/Unlock history

Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on domain accounts. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By Connection Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewall Network Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Firewalls By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: Availability: Firewall Ping Monitor Statistics

Report.Name: Availability: Firewall Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL))

Report.Name: Availability: Firewall Failover
Report.Description: Tracks firewall failovers

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top non-(TCP,UDP) Protocols By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall permitted non-TCP/UDP protocols by the number of received connections

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top non-TCP/UDP Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks firewall permitted source IP, destination IP, non-TCP/UDP ports, and event types first by event severity and then by event count

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: ipProto != 17 AND ipProto != 6 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Firewall Permit: Top ICMP Connections By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks source IP, destination IP, reporting devices and event types for permitted ICMP connections, first by event severity and then by event count.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: ipProto =1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic)

Report.Name: Top Firewalls by System Uptime Pct (Achieved SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by system uptime pct over a time window

Report.Name: Top Firewalls by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)

Report.Name: Top Firewalls by Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by network ping uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Downtime", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)",AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

Report.Name: Top Firewalls by Business Hours Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime",AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)
