Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.1.1: Inbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on inbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.1.2: Outbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on outbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.3 Blocked Web Browsing Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked web browsing activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.4 Blocked File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.5 Blocked File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.8 Permitted Web Browsing Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted web browsing activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.9 Permitted File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC2.10 Permitted File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.1: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Ports, Destinations By Count
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.1: Top Blocked External Sources, Ports, Destinations By Count
Report.Description: Ranks blocked External Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.2: Critical Network Device Errors
Report.Description: Provides critical network device errors

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND eventSeverityCat = "HIGH" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.3: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Provides failed firewall logon details

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.5,PMC3.10: Network Device Warnings
Report.Description: Provides critical network device errors

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND eventSeverityCat = "MEDIUM" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.6: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.6: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.7: Boundary Device Running vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.7: Boundary Device Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.7: Boundary Device Config Changes Detected From Log
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes from syslog

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.10: Top Permitted Outbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.10: Top Permitted Inbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.10: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.10: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC3.10: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.1: Critical Server/Workstation Errors
Report.Description: Provides critical network device errors

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND eventSeverityCat = "HIGH" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.2: Malware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.2: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate Spyware found on a device Host Anti-virus solutions failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.2: Malware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses found and remediated. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.2: Spyware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.3, PMC4.12: Server/Workstation Warnings
Report.Description: Provides server/workstation errors

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND eventSeverityCat = "MEDIUM" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.5, PMC4.6: Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_FileChange) AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.5, PMC4.6: Audited Linux file changes
Report.Description: Tracks user modifications to Linux files and directories. Both the content and attribute modifications are captured. For actions on directories, the affected files in the directories are also captured.

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.10: Install Software Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected install software changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_INST_SW") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.13: Windows System Configuration and Policy Modifications
Report.Description: This report server configuration change and policy modification events

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Network Uptime Pct (Achieved Network SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)",AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Business Hours Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by network ping uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime",AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Accumulated Downtime
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total system downtime over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.7: Top Servers by Accumulated Downtime During Business Hours
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total system downtime during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.8: Server Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks server network interface down and up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.14: Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.14: Application License Expiry
Report.Description: Tracks application license expiry events

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.14: Important Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC4.14: Windows Auto Services Stopped
Report.Description: Reports auto running services that are stopped

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.1: VPN Authentication Failures
Report.Description: Details VPN authentication failures. While some amount of failed login is normal, an unusually high number specifically at odd times of the day may be suspicious

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.1: Top Users By Failed VPN Authentication
Report.Description: Ranks the VPN users by the number of failed VPN logons

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.3: Dynamic VPN Address Assignments
Report.Description: Ranks the VPN users by the number of successful VPN logons

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.4: Permitted Traffic Via VPN
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.4: Denied Traffic Via VPN
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.8: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.8: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.10: Aruba WLAN AP to Host Association Report
Report.Description: Ranks the Aruba WLAN AP Channels by channel utilization. This report has detailed version also includes packet and byte rates and the number of WLAN users

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 3 AND eventType = "PH_DISCOV_ARUBA_WLAN_HOST_LOCATION" AND wlanContrIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.10: Cisco WLAN AP to Host Association Report
Report.Description: Ranks the Cisco WLAN AP Channels by channel utilization. This report has detailed version also includes packet and byte rates and the number of WLAN users

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 3 AND eventType = "PH_DISCOV_CISCO_WLAN_HOST_LOCATION" AND wlanContrIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.12: WLAN IDS Alerts
Report.Description: Ranks WLAN IDS alerts

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessSig) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC6.17: Rogue AP Detected
Report.Description: Provides details of rogue AP events

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessRogue) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.1: Successful Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: Provides details about a successful domain authentication

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.1: Failed Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.1: Successful Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.1: Failed Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.4: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.7: Successful Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.7: Failed Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by failed privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.7: Unix Privileged Command Executions
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.4: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.5: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.5: Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.3: Windows Audit Policy Changed
Report.Description: This report captures audit policy changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-807","Win-Security-4902","Win-Security-517","Win-Security-612","Win-Security-4912","Win-Security-4715","Win-Security-4907") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.3: Computers added to domain
Report.Description: Captures computers added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-645","Win-Security-4741") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.3: Computers deleted from domain
Report.Description: Captures computers removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-647","Win-Security-4743") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.3: Domain user accounts created
Report.Description: Captures user accounts added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain user accounts deleted
Report.Description: Captures user accounts removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630","Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain user accounts modified
Report.Description: Captures domain user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain groups created
Report.Description: Captures domain group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-653", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727","Win-Security-4749", "Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain groups deleted
Report.Description: Captures domain group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-657", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730","Win-Security-4753", "Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain groups modified
Report.Description: Captures domain group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-654", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737","Win-Security-4750", "Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Added To Domain Groups
Report.Description: Tracks users added to domain groups

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberAdded) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Deleted From Domain Groups
Report.Description: Tracks users deleted from domain groups. The information contains who did it (User, Computer, Domain, Source IP) along with the deleted account (Target User) and group (Target User Group).

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberRemoved) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Domain User Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Local User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Local User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650", "Win-Security-4732","Win-Security-4746") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Added To Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-632", "Win-Security-655","Win-Security-660", "Win-Security-665", "Win-Security-4728", "Win-Security-4751","Win-Security-4756", "Win-Security-4761") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Deleted From Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-638", "Win-Security-651","Win-Security-4733", "Win-Security-4747") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Users Deleted From Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-633", "Win-Security-656","Win-Security-661", "Win-Security-666","Win-Security-4729", "Win-Security-4752","Win-Security-4757", "Win-Security-4762") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Local Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures local group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-637", "Win-Security-652","Win-Security-4734", "Win-Security-4748") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.10: Local Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_37

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.6: User added to Privileged Windows Groups
Report.Description: Tracks users added to Windows priviledged groups such as Domain Admins, Remote Desktop Users, Backup Operators, DNS Admins, Administrators

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberAdded) AND targetUserGrp IN ("Domain Admins","Remote Desktop Users","Administrators","Backup Operators","DnsAdmins") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Description: Tracks users removed from Windows priviledged groups such as Domain Admins, Remote Desktop Users, Backup Operators, DNS Admins, Administrators

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberRemoved) AND targetUserGrp IN ("Domain Admins","Remote Desktop Users","Administrators","Backup Operators","DnsAdmins") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.6: Unix Users Added To Group

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_12

Report.Name: GPG13 PMC7.6: Unix User Password Changed

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_GPG13)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Router Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Router Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Top Firewalls and Outbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Top Firewalls and Inbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Top Firewalls and Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 1.x: Top Firewalls and Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Top Firewalls and Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4): Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Detailed Successful Login At HIPAA Device
Report.Description: Captures detailed successful logins at any device or application including servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Detailed Failed Login At HIPAA System
Report.Description: Captures detailed failed logins at any device or application - servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Successful Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Failed Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 10.x: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Successful Windows Server Logons
Report.Description: This report records successful windows server logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Failed Windows Server Logons
Report.Description: This report reports failed windows servers logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Successful Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c),164.312(a)(2): Failed Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(4),164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(5)(ii)(c): Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(5): Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(6): Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(6): Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(6): Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures hosts with malware found by host anti-virus solutions

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(6): Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.308(a)(6): Top Network Scanners By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses by detected network scan or reconnaissance events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_SEC) AND (srcIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA) OR destIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA) )

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.312(a)(2): Failed Database Server Logons

Report.Name: HIPAA 164.312(b): Windows Audit Policy Changed
Report.Description: This report captures audit policy changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-807","Win-Security-4902","Win-Security-517","Win-Security-612","Win-Security-4912","Win-Security-4715","Win-Security-4907") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_HIPAA)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.8.1.1: CMDB Device Addition and Deletion History
Report.Description: Details the history of devices getting added and deleted from CMDB

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 2 AND eventType IN ("PH_AUDIT_DEVICE_DELETED","PH_AUDIT_DEVICE_ADDED") AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.8.1.1: CMDB Device Modification History
Report.Description: Details the history of device attribute changed in CMDB

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 2 AND eventType = "PH_AUDIT_DEVICE_DISCOVERY_ITEM_CHANGED" AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Firewall Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about firewall admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Router Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about router admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Detailed Successful Login At ISO 27001 Device
Report.Description: Captures detailed successful logins at any device or application including servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Windows Domain Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report details windows domain account lockouts

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Domain Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on domain accounts. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Successful Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Failed Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by failed privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.9.4: Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Network Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Network Device Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Network Config Changes Detected From Log
Report.Description: This report provides details about router config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726")

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevName IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650", "Win-Security-4732","Win-Security-4746") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Description: This report captures users added to global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-632", "Win-Security-655","Win-Security-660", "Win-Security-665", "Win-Security-4728", "Win-Security-4751","Win-Security-4756", "Win-Security-4761") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Users Deleted From Global Groups

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-633", "Win-Security-656","Win-Security-661", "Win-Security-666","Win-Security-4729", "Win-Security-4752","Win-Security-4757", "Win-Security-4762") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures local group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-638", "Win-Security-652","Win-Security-4734", "Win-Security-4748") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-639", "Win-Security-649","Win-Security-4735", "Win-Security-4745") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Local Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648","Win-Security-4731", "Win-Security-4744") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Global Windows Groups Created

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663", "Win-Security-4727", "Win-Security-4749","Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Global Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667", "Win-Security-4730", "Win-Security-4753","Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Global Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664", "Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: User added to Privileged Windows Groups

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberAdded) AND targetUserGrp IN ("Domain Admins","Remote Desktop Users","Administrators","Backup Operators","DnsAdmins") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
