Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Unix Users Added To Group
Report.Description: Tracks user additions to groups

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType = "Generic_Unix_User_Add") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.2: Windows System Configuration and Policy Modifications
Report.Description: This report server configuration change and policy modification events

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top VMs By PCPU Ready Pct
Report.Description: This report ranks VMware virtual machines by per-cpu ready percent. A high number indicates the VM is starved of CPU

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top ESX By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by aggregate cpu utilization. Other CPU usage metrics are included.

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top ESX By Memory Utilization With Details
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by memory utilization. Other memory usage metrics are included.

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top ESX By Device Disk Read Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by device disk I/O read latency

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top ESX By Device Disk Write Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by device disk I/O write latency.

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top Datastores By Least Free Space
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX datastore with lowest free space

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: VMware Cluster Utilization Report
Report.Description: This report provides a cluster level resource utilization report; ranked by CPU util

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top Routers/Firewalls Ranked By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Top Routers/Firewalls By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Windows Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks windows servers by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.1.3: Unix Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks windows servers by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Inbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on inbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Outbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on outbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Blocked Web Browsing Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked web browsing activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Blocked File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Blocked File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Permitted File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2, A.13: Permitted File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2: Malware found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2: Spyware found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate Spyware found on a device Host Anti-virus solutions failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2: Malware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses found and remediated. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2: Spyware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.2: Windows File Modification (via FortiSIEM Agent)
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access events detected via FortiSIEM Windows Agent.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("AO-WUA-FileMon-Added", "AO-WUA-FileMon-Modified","AO-WUA-FileMon-Removed") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.4.1: Top Reporting Modules By Event Rate (Per Sec)
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting device modules by sent events per second

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 3 AND eventType = "PH_SYSTEM_DEVAPP_EVENTS_PER_SEC" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.4.1:Top Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the events by the number of times they have occurred in a given time period.

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.4.4: Windows System Clock Change
Report.Description: Tracks system clock changes on windows systems

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.6.1: Host vulnerability found by scanners
Report.Description: Details the vulnerabilities discovered on hosts

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.12.6.1: Top Hosts with Vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: Ranks the hosts by vulnerabilities found by scanners

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: Install Software Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected install software changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Wkstn) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_INST_SW") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: Windows Installed Software Changes (Via FortiSIEM Agent)
Report.Description: This report captures installed software changes detected via FortiSIEM Agent

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("AO-WUA-InstSw-Added","AO-WUA-InstSw-Removed") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: Windows Registry Changes (Via FortiSIEM Agent)
Report.Description: This report captures registry changes detected via FortiSIEM Agent

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("AO-WUA-Registry-Added","AO-WUA-Registry-Modified","AO-WUA-Registry-Removed") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Top Permitted Outbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Top Permitted Inbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.13: Rogue AP Detected
Report.Description: Provides details of rogue AP events

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessRogue) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: ISO 27001 Related Incidents
Report.Description: Captures ISO 27001 Related incidents in a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: phRecvTime, eventType, eventSeverity, eventSeverityCat, reptDevName, incidentSrc, incidentTarget, count

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: ISO 27001 Related Incident Categories By Count
Report.Description: Captures ISO 27001 Related incidents in a time window

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.16: ISO 27001 Related Incidents, Assigned Users By Resolution Time
Report.Description: ISO 27001 Related Incidents, Assigned Users By Resolution time

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.17: Top Applications By Synthetic Transaction Response Time
Report.Description: Ranks the services by average synthetic transaction monitoring probe response times.

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.17: Top STMs by Business Hours Uptime Pct (Achieved Application SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks Synthetic transaction monitor tests (STM) by achieved uptime over a time window

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_EUM_STATUS" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.17: Top Devices by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 27001 A.17: Top Devices by Accumulated Network Ping Downtime During Business Hours
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by total network ping downtime during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO_27001)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Computers added to domain
Report.Description: Captures computers added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-645","Win-Security-4741") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Computers deleted from domain
Report.Description: Captures computers removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-647","Win-Security-4743") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts created
Report.Description: Captures user accounts added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts deleted
Report.Description: Captures user accounts removed from a domain

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630","Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts modified
Report.Description: Captures domain user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain groups created
Report.Description: Captures domain group creations

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-653", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727","Win-Security-4749", "Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain groups deleted
Report.Description: Captures domain group deletions

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-657", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730","Win-Security-4753", "Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Domain groups modified
Report.Description: Captures domain group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-654", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737","Win-Security-4750", "Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Modified

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650", "Win-Security-4732","Win-Security-4746") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Windows Groups Modified

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Windows Groups Created

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648","Win-Security-4731", "Win-Security-4744") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Global Windows Groups Created

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727", "Win-Security-4749","Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Global Windows Groups Modified

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Global Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures global group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727", "Win-Security-4749","Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Global Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730", "Win-Security-4753","Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Global Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Local Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648","Win-Security-4731", "Win-Security-4744") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Audited Linux file changes
Report.Description: Tracks user modifications to Linux files and directories. Both the content and attribute modifications are captured. For actions on directories, the affected files in the directories are also captured.

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Windows Domain Controller Config Changes
Report.Description: Provides detailed windows domain controller config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Windows Server Config Modification Details
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server configuration or policy modification events. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: Change Mgmt: Windows File Access Successes
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access successes. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND eventAction = 0 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.1.2: All VMWare VCenter Account/Group Change Events
Report.Description: This report lists all account/group change events

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND vmwEventCat IS NOT NULL AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Network Devices By CPU Util, Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks network devices by first average cpu utilization and then memory utilization

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL","PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Servers By CPU Util, Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks servers by first average cpu utilization and then memory utilization

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL","PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Firewalls By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Network Device Interfaces By Utilization, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the network device interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Server Network Interfaces By Utilization, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the server network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top Server Processes By CPU, Mem Util
Report.Description: Ranks the server processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top VMs By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by cpu utilization and CPU Ready pct

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top VMs By Memory Utilization and swap activity
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by memory utilization and swap activity

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top VMs By Ballooning Memory
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by balooning memory size. Excessive balooning may indicate that a VM has been allocated too much memory and ESX is allocating unused memory to other VMs.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top VMs By Disk I/O Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by disk I/O activity. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by aggregate cpu utilization. Other CPU usage metrics are included.

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by memory utilization. Other memory usage metrics are included.

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: ESX Servers With Balooning Memory
Report.Description: This report identifies ESX hosts with low enough free memory so that ESX is using memory balooning technique for memory management

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND (freeMemState IN (2,3)) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: ESX Servers With Swapping Memory
Report.Description: This report identifies ESX hosts with low memory where swapping memory technique is used for memory management

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND (freeMemState IN (1,2)) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By Disk I/O Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by disk I/O operations. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By Disk Latency
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by disk I/O latency. Other disk I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By Network Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by network activity.

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: VMWare Datastores with Lowest Free Space
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX datastore with lowest free space

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DATASTORE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VM_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top VMs By Datastore I/O Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks virtual machines by datastore I/O activity. Other datastore I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: Top ESX Servers By Datastore I/O Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by datsatore I/O operations. Other datastore I/O usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: VMWare Resource Pool Utilization Report
Report.Description: This report ranks VMWare resource pools by CPU utilization

Report.Name: ISO 10.3.1: VMWare Cluster Utilization Report
Report.Description: This report provides a cluster level resource utilization report; ranked by CPU util

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Virus found and remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found and remediated

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Spyware found and remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware that Host Antivirus found and remediated

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Ranks computers by the number of malware (virus, spyware, botnet etc) found by host anti-virus

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Reporting Security Management Servers
Report.Description: Ranks Security Management Servers by event received

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Reporting Network IPS By Event Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Network IPS Devices By Event Count

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Network IPS Events By Severity, Count (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the network IPS events by count

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Network Scanners By Event Count (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses by detected network scan or reconnaissance events

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Reconn) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Blocked Network Attacks By Count (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the network attacks blocked by network IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Network IPS events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network IPS events by count

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Top Source Countries By Network IPS Events
Report.Description: This report ranks the countries originating the most inbound IPS Events

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Traffic Dropped by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Traffic denied by Cisco ASA Botnet filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338005","ASA-338006","ASA-338007","ASA-338008","ASA-338203","ASA-338204") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Traffic Permitted by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Traffic permitted by Cisco ASA Botnet filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338001","ASA-338002","ASA-338003","ASA-338004","ASA-338101","ASA-338102", "ASA-338103","ASA-338104","ASA-338201","ASA-338202") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Infected Source IPs detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Infected Source IP addresses detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338001","ASA-338003","ASA-338005","ASA-338007","ASA-338201","ASA-338203") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Infected Destination IPs detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Infected Source IP addresses detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338002","ASA-338004","ASA-338006","ASA-338008","ASA-338202","ASA-338204") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Inbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on inbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Outbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on outbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: WLAN IDS Alerts
Report.Description: Ranks WLAN IDS alerts

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessSig) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.4.x: Rogue AP Detected
Report.Description: Provides details of rogue AP events

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessRogue) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Blocked Web Browsing Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked web browsing activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Blocked File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Blocked File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports blocked file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Permitted Web Browsing Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted web browsing activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Permitted File Import Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file import activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod = "GET"

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Permitted File Export Activity
Report.Description: Reports permitted file export activity as reported by firewalls and security gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitWebTraffic,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO) AND httpContentType IS NOT NULL AND httpMethod IN ("POST", "PUT")

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Ports, Destinations
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Blocked External Sources, Ports, Destinations
Report.Description: Ranks blocked External Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Permitted Outbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Permitted Inbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.1: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2,11.4.2: VPN Authentication Failures
Report.Description: Details VPN authentication failures. While some amount of failed login is normal, an unusually high number specifically at odd times of the day may be suspicious

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2,11.4.2: Top VPN Users By Failed Authentication
Report.Description: Ranks the VPN users by the number of failed VPN logons

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2,11.4.2: VPN Authentication Successes
Report.Description: Details VPN authentication successes

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2,11.4.2: Top VPN Users By Successful Authentication
Report.Description: Ranks the VPN users by the number of successful VPN logons

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed Router Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful Router Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful Firewall Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed Firewall Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: Provides details about a successful domain authentication

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Successful Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.2: Failed Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.2: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.2: Successful Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.2: Failed Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by failed privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.2: Unix Privileged Command Executions
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.3: Domain User Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.3: Windows Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 11.2.3: Unix User Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks user password changes in Unix systems

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 12.6.1,13.1.2: Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NoncompliantHost) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 12.6.1,13.1.2: Host vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: This report details the host vulnerabilties found by scanners like Qualys, Nessus, nCircle etc

Report.Name: ISO 12.6.1,13.1.2: Top Hosts with Vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: Ranks the hosts by vulnerabilities found by scanners

Report.Name: ISO 12.6.1,13.1.2: Host vulnerability found by scanners with details
Report.Description: Details the vulnerabilities discovered on hosts

Report.Name: ISO 12.6.1,13.1.2: Top OS types with vulnerabilities
Report.Description: Ranks OS types by vulnerabilities found

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: Windows Audit Policy Changed
Report.Description: This report captures audit policy changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-807","Win-Security-4902","Win-Security-517","Win-Security-612","Win-Security-4912","Win-Security-4715","Win-Security-4907") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: FortiSIEM System Admin Successful Logon
Report.Description: Ranks System Admin Users By Successful Logon Count

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: FortiSIEM System Admin Failed Logon
Report.Description: Ranks System Admin Users By Failed Logon Count

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: FortiSIEM System user added
Report.Description: Records all system user creation activity

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: FortiSIEM System User password modification
Report.Description: Records all system user password modification

Report.Name: ISO 10.10.1: FortiSIEM System User Lockouts
Report.Description: Details all System Admin User Logon Attempts

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Filtered Inbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total inbound spam denied by spam filtering policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_18
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Filtered Outbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total outbound spam denied by policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Top Mail Security Gateway Actions By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the actions taken by the mail security gateway - actions include blocking an inbound/outbound mail gateway because of RBL or other SMTP violations, blocking a mail because of spam or other policy violations and delivering a mail

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitMailTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Mail dropped by Anti-virus
Report.Description: Records all mail that tested positive for Anti-virus but was dropped

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Mail quarantined for Spam
Report.Description: Records all mail that was quarantined for suspicion of spam

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Mail dropped by filter
Report.Description: Records all mail that was dropped by a configured filter

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Mail soft bounce: delivery delayed
Report.Description: Records all mail that was delayed

Report.Name: ISO 10.8.4: Mail hard bounce: delivery failed

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top Internal DNS Servers By Requests Served
Report.Description: Ranks the internal DNS servers by requests served. A DNS is internal if it is in a private address space.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destIpPort = 53 AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Requesters By Requests
Report.Description: Ranks the IP addresses making DNS queries by the total number of requests. DNS servers are expected to show up at the top followed by other end hosts. User machines making a large number of DNS queries are suspect.

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top Queried Domain Names
Report.Description: Ranks the queried domain names by the number of name resolution requests

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Query Types
Report.Description: Top DNS query types

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Requesters, DNS Servers By Uncommon DNS Query Count
Report.Description: Ranks IP addresses making uncommon DNS queries and the DNS servers by the total count of such queries. Any DNS query other than A and PTR query is considered uncommon

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_") AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_CommonDNSTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Requesters and Resolved Names By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the DNS requesters and the host for whom DNS service is requested by the total number of requests.

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Servers By Response Time
Report.Description: Ranks the DNS Servers by average application level probe response times

SubPattern.name: Filter_AVAIL
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_EUM_SUCCESS" AND appPort = "53" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Server Processes by Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks the windows applications (processes) by application uptime

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "Microsoft DNS") OR (appName CONTAIN "Bind DNS")) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_ISO)

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Zones By Successful Queries
Report.Description: Ranks DNS Zones by successful responses along with other statistics. Available for InfoBlox DNS ServerOne Appliances only.

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Zones By Failed Queries
Report.Description: Ranks DNS Zones by failed queries along with other statistics.Available for InfoBlox DNS ServerOne Appliances only.

Report.Name: ISO 10.6.2: Top DNS Servers by DDNS Update Activity
Report.Description: Ranks DNS servers by DDNS Activity - successful, failed and rejects.Available for InfoBlox DNS ServerOne Appliances only.

Report.Description: Reports DNS servers by Cluster Replication Activity

Report.Description: This query reports DHCP IP Address Assignments

Report.Name: FortiMail System Restart Activity
Report.Description: This report captures FortiMail restart activity

Report.Description: This report captures FortiMail successful user logon

Report.Name: FortiMail Failed Admin Logon
Report.Description: This report captures FortiMail failed user logon

Report.Name: FortiMail Operational Errors
Report.Description: This report captures FortiMail Operational Errors

Report.Name: FortiMail Upgrade/Downgrade Activity
Report.Description: This report captures FortiMail Upgrade/Downgrade Activity

Report.Name: FortiMail Found Spam Details
Report.Description: This report captures Fortimail detected spam details

Report.Name: Top Spam Sources Found By FortiMail
FortiMail Found Spam Count
Report.Description: This report counts the total number of spam mail found by FortiMail

Report.Name: Top Spam Subjects Found By FortiMail
Report.Description: This report ranks the Spam email subjects found by FortiMail

Report.Name: Top Spam Rules Found By FortiMail
Report.Description: This report ranks the Spam rules found by FortiMail

Report.Name: FortiMail Top Virus Infections
Report.Description: This report captures virus infections found by FortiMail

Report.Name: FortiMail Top Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks FortiMail classifiers

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND classifier IS NOT NULL AND eventType CONTAIN "FortiMail-"

Report.Name: FortiMail Top Destination Users
Report.Description: This report ranks FortiMail source users

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND destUser IS NOT NULL AND eventType CONTAIN "FortiMail-"

Report.Name: FortiMail Top Source Users
Report.Description: This report ranks FortiMail destination users

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND srcUser IS NOT NULL AND eventType CONTAIN "FortiMail-"

Report.Name: FortiMail Top Communications
Report.Description: This report ranks FortiMail source to destination commnunications

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND srcUser IS NOT NULL AND destUser IS NOT NULL AND eventType CONTAIN "FortiMail-"

Report.Name: FortiMail Total Emails
Report.Description: This report counts total FortiMail emails

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND eventType CONTAIN "FortiMail-History-Accept" AND classifier = "Not Spam"

Report.Name: Top Reporting Mail Servers
Report.Description: Ranks reporting mail servers by event count

Report.Name: Top Reporting Mail Server Event Types By Count
Report.Description: Ranks reporting mail server event types by count

Report.Name: Top Mail Server Processes By CPU, Memory, I/O
Report.Description: Ranks the mail server processes by average cpu, memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "MS Exchange") OR (appName CONTAIN "Sendmail") OR (appName CONTAIN "Postfix"))

Report.Name: Top Mail Server Processes By CPU
Report.Description: Ranks the mail server processes by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "MS Exchange") OR (appName CONTAIN "Sendmail") OR (appName CONTAIN "Postfix"))

Report.Name: Top Mail Server Processes By Memory
Report.Description: Ranks the mail server processes by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "MS Exchange") OR (appName CONTAIN "Sendmail") OR (appName CONTAIN "Postfix"))

Report.Name: Top Mail Server Processes By I/O Activity
Report.Description: Ranks the mail server processes by average I/O activity

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND ((appName CONTAIN "MS Exchange") OR (appName CONTAIN "Sendmail") OR (appName CONTAIN "Postfix"))

Report.Name: Top Exchange Servers By Disk I/O Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the mail servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DISK_IO_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_MAIL_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Exchange Servers By Disk I/O Latency
Report.Description: Ranks the mail servers by average disk I/O read/write latency. This requires WMI.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DISK_IO_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_MAIL_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Exchange Servers By Disk Queue length
Report.Description: Ranks the mail servers by average disk I/O queue length. This requires WMI.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DISK_IO_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_MAIL_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Exchange Servers By Page Swapping Rate
Report.Description: Ranks the mail servers by average swapping rate

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_MAIL_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND memName = "Physical Memory"

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers By User Count
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange Servers by user count and provides other metrics (collected via WMI)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, AVG(exchUserCount), AVG(exchActiveUserCount), MAX(exchPeakUserCount), AVG(exchActiveConnCount), MAX(exchMaxConn)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers By RPC Requests
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange Servers by rpc requests and provides other metrics (collected via WMI)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, AVG(exchRPCReq), AVG(exchRPCAvgLatency), AVG(exchRPCOpsPerSec), MAX(exchRPCReqPeak), SUM(exchRPCReq), SUM(exchRPCFailed), SUM(exchRPCSuccess)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers By RPC Errors
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange Servers by rpc errors and provides error details (collected via WMI)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, SUM(exchRPCFailed), SUM(exchRPCSuccess), SUM(exchRPCCallFailed), SUM(exchRPCDenied), SUM(exchRPCFailedServBusy), SUM(exchRPCFailedServUnavail), SUM(exchBgRPCFailed), SUM(exchFgRPCFailed)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Queues by Count (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange mailbox queues by count and along with other details (collected via WMI)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Queues by Count
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange mailbox queues by count and along with other details (collected via WMI)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers by SMTP Queues
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange SMTP queues by count (collected via WMI)

OrderByClause.AttrList: AVG(exchCatQueue) DESC, AVG(exchSMTPLocalQueue) DESC, AVG(exchSMTPRemoteQueue) DESC

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers by SMTP Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange mailbox queues by count and along with other details (collected via WMI)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers by SMTP Retries
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange mailbox queues by count and along with other details (collected via WMI)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers by SMTP Metrics (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange servers by SMTP queues and presents all SMTP metrics in one report (collected via WMI)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, AVG(exchCatQueue), AVG(exchSMTPLocalQueue), AVG(exchSMTPRemoteQueue), AVG(exchSMTPInConn), AVG(exchSMTPOutConn), AVG(sentBytesPerSec),AVG(recvBytesPerSec),AVG(exchSMTPRetries),AVG(exchSMTPLocalRetryQueue),AVG(exchSMTPRemoteRetryQueue)

Report.Name: Top Microsoft Exchange Servers by Mailbox Whitespace Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the Microsoft Exchange mailbox whitespace utilization (collected via WMI)

Report.Name: Microsoft Exchange Store Client Request Metrics
Report.Description: Reports Microsoft Exchange Store Client Request Metrics

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: (eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_APP_MSEXCH_STORE_INTF_MET" AND exchStoreIntfName = "_Total") OR eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_APP_MSEXCH_SUBMIT_MET" OR (eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_APP_MSEXCH_REPL_MET" AND exchReplInstName = "_total")
