Report.Name: Logon: MS Azure Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked)

Report.Name: All Events: Top MS Azure Windows Reporting Servers By Event Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers by the total number of events sent

Report.Name: Logon: Privileged MS Azure Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Remote Desktop Connections to MS Azure Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: MS Azure Windows Server Logons
Report.Description: This report captures all logons (sucessful and failed) to windows servers

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Windows Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange)

Report.Name: Logon: MS Azure Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked)

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Windows Audit Policy Changes
Report.Description: This report captures audit policy changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-807","Win-Security-4902","Win-Security-517","Win-Security-612","Win-Security-4912","Win-Security-4715","Win-Security-4907")

Report.Name: Performance: Top MS Azure Windows Servers By Memory Util and swap rate
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization and swap rate

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top MS Azure Windows Servers By Disk I/O Latency
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DISK_IO_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top MS Azure Windows Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) IN reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: MS Azure Windows Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks windows servers by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Availability: MS Azure Windows Hardware Errors
Report.Description: Captures Windows hardware warning and critical errors. Supported hardware includes Dell and HP

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HwProblem)

Report.Name: Availability: MS Azure Windows Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: MS Azure Windows Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppRestart) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: Top MS Azure Windows Servers by Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by system uptime

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Availability: MS Azure Windows Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

SubPattern.name: Filter_SRVC_UPDOWN
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_PROC_START","PH_DEV_MON_PROC_STOP") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventAction = 1

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Windows File Access Successes
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access successes. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventAction = 0

Report.Name: Performance: Top MS Azure Windows servers by page file usage
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average page file usage over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_PAGEFILE_USAGE" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Performance: Top MS Azure Windows Applications By CPU, Memory
Report.Description: Ranks Windows processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Logon: Successful MS Azure Linux Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Failed MS Azure Linux Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Succesful MS Azure Linux Server Privilege Escalation
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Failed MS Azure Linux Server Privilege Escalation
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by failed privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Activity: Successful MS Azure Linux Servers Privileged Command Executions
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege command escalations (sudo) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess)

Report.Name: Activity: MS Azure Linux Failed Privileged Command Executions

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Linux Users Added To Group

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType = "Generic_Unix_User_Add" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute)

Report.Name: Change: MS Azure Linux User Password Changed

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AZURE_Compute) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange)

Reports:
NERC CIP_005_R2.2, NERC CIP_005_R4.2, NERC CIP_007_R2: Top Firewalls and Outbound Permitted Services (Ports) By Connections, Bytes
Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service
reptDevIpAddr,ipProto, destIpPort, srcIntfName,destIntfName,COUNT(*),SUM(sentBytes), SUM(recvBytes), SUM(totBytes)
COUNT(*) DESC, SUM(totBytes) DESC

reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NERC)

Ranks the security related incidents by first their severity and then by their count
eventType,eventSeverity,COUNT(*)
eventSeverity DESC,COUNT(*) DESC

false false bizService

COUNT(*) DESC

false false bizService

false false bizService

AVG(incidentResoTime) DESC

false false bizService

eventSeverityCat,AVG(incidentResoTime)

false false bizService

phRecvMonth,eventSeverityCat,AVG(incidentResoTime)
phRecvMonth DESC, eventSeverityCat DESC

false false bizService

Incidents By Location and Category

false false bizService
