SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 AC-17: Top VPN Gateways, Users Ranked By Session Count, Bytes, Duration
Report.Description: Ranks the VPN Gateways and their users by the total amount ofexchanged bytes. This report provides further insight into the top VPN users from a bytes transferred perspective

Report.Name: NIST800-53 AC-17: Top Wireless Controllers, Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks wireless controllers by successful logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-3: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-3: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-3: Router/Switch Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-3: Router/Switch Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-3: WLAN Config Change
Report.Description: This report tracks all software, hardware and device configuration changes at WLAN Access points and Base stations. The report includes Original Reporting Controller IP, Event Type and MAC address of the AP or Controller where the event happened. If the MAC address is empty then, the event happened at the reporting Controller.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-11: Windows Installed Software Changes (Via FortiSIEM Agent)
Report.Description: This report captures installed software changes detected via FortiSIEM Agent

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("AO-WUA-InstSw-Added","AO-WUA-InstSw-Removed") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 CM-11: Windows Registry Changes (Via FortiSIEM Agent)
Report.Description: This report captures registry changes detected via FortiSIEM Agent

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("AO-WUA-Registry-Added","AO-WUA-Registry-Modified","AO-WUA-Registry-Removed") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-4: Incidents, Assigned Users By Resolution Time
Report.Description: Incidents By Assigned Users and resolution time

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-4: Monthly Incident Resolution Time Trend
Report.Description: Incidents severities by resolution time

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-4: Monthly Assigned Incident User Trend
Report.Description: Monthly Incidents By Assigned Users

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Top Security Incidents By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the security related incidents by first their severity and then by their count

Report.Name: Top Devices and Security Incident Details By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the affected devices and security related incidents by count

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Top Monitored Device Groups By Incident Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks monitored device groups by incident severity and count

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Top Monitored Device Groups By Incident Name, Count
Report.Description: Ranks monitored device groups by incident name and count

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Weekly Incident Trend
Report.Description: Shows incident trend on a week-by-week basis

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Monthly Incident Trend
Report.Description: Shows incident trend on a month-by-month basis

Report.Name: NIST800-53 IR-5: Incidents By Location and Category
Report.Description: Incidents By Location and Category

Report.Name: NIST800-53 RA-5: Host vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: This report details the host vulnerabilties found by scanners like Qualys, Nessus, nCircle, McAfee etc

Report.Name: NIST800-53 RA-5: Host vulnerability found by scanners with details
Report.Description: Details the vulnerabilities discovered on hosts

Report.Name: NIST800-53 RA-5: Top Hosts with Vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: Ranks the hosts by vulnerabilities found by scanners

Report.Name: NIST800-53 RA-5: Top OS types with vulnerabilities
Report.Description: Ranks OS types by vulnerabilities found

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-7: Top Permitted Outbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-7: Top Permitted Inbound Connections By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-7: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-7: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-7: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_NIST800_53)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-19: VoIP Call Report
Report.Description: This is a call detail report

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-19: VoIP Call Volume Trend
Report.Description: Trends the call volume

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-19: Top VoIP Callers
Report.Description: Ranks the VoIP callers by call count and duration

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SC-19: Top VoIP Called Destinations
Report.Description: Ranks the VoIP destinations by call count and duration

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top Internal Network Scanners By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses by detected network scan or reconnaissance events

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Reconn) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top External Source Countries By Network IPS Events
Report.Description: This report ranks the countries originating the most inbound IPS Events

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top Network IPS Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network IPS events by count

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Malware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses found and remediated. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Virus found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate viruses found but failed to remedy - the events could be from Host Anti-virus or Network Security Gateways. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Spyware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Spyware found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found but the detecting software failed to remediated the vulnerability. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Spam/Malicious Mail Attachment found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spam or mailicious mail attachments were found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle, Websense Mail gateway, Ironport Mail Gateway etc.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Phishing attempt found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate phishing attempt

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top Computers with Malware Found By Antivirus and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks computers with Malware as found by Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top IPs with Malware Found By IPS and Firewalls
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by IPS - these are somewhat less reliable than Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top IPs with Malware Found By Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by Security Gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT)

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Rogue APs detected
Report.Description: Lists the rogue APs

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-4: Top WLAN IDS Alerts
Report.Description: Ranks WLAN IDS alerts

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-8: IronPort Mail quarantined for Spam
Report.Description: Records all mail that was quarantined for suspicion of spam

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-8: IronPort Mail dropped by filter
Report.Description: Records all mail that was dropped by a configured filter

Report.Name: NIST800-53 SI-8: Spam/Malicious Mail Attachment found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found but the detecting software did not remediated the vulnerability. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle, Websense Mail gateway, Ironport Mail Gateway etc.

Report.Name: Office365 User Management Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 User creation, deletion, modification activity

Report.Name: Top Office365 User Management Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks all Office365 User creation, deletion, modification activity

Report.Name: Office365 User Group Management Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 User Group creation, deletion and modification activity

Report.Name: Office365 User Group Membership Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 activity related to user added/removed from groups

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType CONTAIN "MS_Office365" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberRemoved, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberAdded)

Report.Name: Top Office365 User Group Management Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks all Office365 User Group creation/deletion/modification and user add/remove activity

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType CONTAIN "MS_Office365" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountCreated, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountDeleted, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberRemoved, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupMemberAdded)

Report.Name: Office365 File/Folder Access
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 users accessing, creating, deleting, uploading, downloading files

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType CONTAIN "MS_Office365" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_FileAccess) AND eventType NOT IN ("MS_Office365_UnmanagedSyncClientBlocked", "MS_Office365_AccessRequestDenied")

Report.Name: Office365 File/Folder Property Modification
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 users modifying file sharing properties

Report.Name: Top Office365 File/Folder Property Modification
Report.Description: This report ranks all Office365 users modifying file sharing properties

Report.Name: Office365 Password Change
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user password change

Report.Name: Office365 Password Policy Change
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user password policy changes

Report.Name: Office365 User Logon
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user logon

Report.Name: Top Office365 User Logon
Report.Description: This report ranks all Office365 user logon

Report.Name: Office365 Application Registration Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 application registration activity

Report.Name: Office365 Application Registration Update
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 application registration activity

Report.Name: Office365 User Mailbox Create/Delete/Update Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user mailbox create, delete, move and update activity

Report.Name: Top Office365 User Mailbox Create/Delete/Update Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user mailbox create, delete, move and update activity

Report.Name: Office365 Unusual User Send Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 user SendAs and SendOnBehalf activity

Report.Name: Office365 Site Change Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 site modification activity

Report.Name: Top Office365 Site Change Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 site modification activity

Report.Name: Office365 Sway Management Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all Office365 sway create, delete, update activity

Report.Name: Office365 Blocked User Activity
Report.Description: This report lists all denied Office365 user activity

Report.Name: Top Office365 Blocked User Activity
Report.Description: This report ranks all denied Office365 user activity

Report.Name: Top Devices By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Top Network CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the network devices by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Top Servers By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the servers by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Top Web Servers By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the web servers by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_WEB_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Devices By Memory Util (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: Top Network Devices By Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND (memName = "Physical Memory")

Report.Name: Top Servers By Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks the servers by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND (memName = "Physical Memory")

Report.Name: Top Servers By Swapping Rate
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average swapping rate

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND (memName = "Physical Memory")

Report.Name: Top AWS Servers By Swapping Rate
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average swapping rate

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND (memName = "Physical Memory") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Top Web Servers By Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks the web servers by average memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND (memName = "Physical Memory") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_WEB_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: AWS Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Top Servers By Disk Space Util (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window. It also provides details about total, used and free disk sizes

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Top Servers By Daily Disk Space Growth (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average daily disk space growth

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_TREND_DAY" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Servers By Least Days to Disk Full (Daily estimate)
Report.Description: Ranks the servers by the estimated days before the disk will become full

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_TREND_DAY" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Top Servers By Weekly Disk Space Growth (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average weekly disk space growth

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_TREND_WEEK" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Top Servers By Monthly Disk Space Growth (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average monthly disk space growth

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_TREND_MONTH" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot")

Report.Name: Web Servers By Least Free Disk Space
Report.Description: Ranks the web servers by minimum free disk space over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_WEB_SERVER)

Report.Name: Top Firewalls By Connection Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

Report.Name: Top Server Interfaces By Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND intfName NOT IN ("lo","Null0")

Report.Name: Top Network Interfaces By Util
Report.Description: Ranks the network devices interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,intfName,AVG(inIntfUtil) "Recv Util",AVG(recvBitsPerSec) "Recv Bps",AVG(outIntfUtil) "Sent Util", AVG(sentBitsPerSec) "Sent Bps"

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND intfName NOT IN ("lo","Null0")

Report.Name: Top Network Interfaces By 95th Pctile Traffic
Report.Description: Ranks the network devices interfaces by 95th percentile traffic

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND intfName NOT IN ("lo","Null0")

Report.Name: Top Device Interfaces By Errors
Report.Description: Ranks the devices and network interfaces by average interface packet errors over a window

OrderByClause.AttrList: SUM(inIntfPktErr) DESC, AVG(outIntfPktErrPct) DESC, SUM(outIntfPktErr) DESC

Report.Name: Top Network Devices By Free Memory
Report.Description: Ranks the network devices by amount of free memory

Report.Name: Top Devices By Per-CPU Util
Report.Description: This report ranks the devices by per cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Top Device Interfaces By Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the devices and network interfaces by average interface packet discards over a window

Report.Name: Top Windows Servers By Disk I/O Activity (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

Report.Name: Top Unix Servers By Disk I/O Activity (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the Unix servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. Different Unix flavors provide different parameters. Linux and IBM AIX provides disk utilization, latency, separate read/write frequencies and transfer rates. HP UX provides combined (read and write) transfer rate and disk seek rate.

Report.Name: Top Unix Servers By Disk I/O Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the Unix servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window.

Report.Name: Top Unix Servers By Disk RW Latency
Report.Description: Ranks the Unix servers by average disk I/O RW Latency

Report.Name: Top Windows Servers By Disk I/O Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

Report.Name: Top Windows Servers By Disk I/O Latency
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O read/write latency. This requires WMI.

Report.Name: Top Windows Servers By Disk I/O Queue length
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O queue length. This requires WMI.

Report.Name: Top Unix Servers By Memory Util (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks the unix devices by average memory utilization over a window and provides details of memory utilization components such as buffered and cached memory

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,memName, AVG(memUtil), AVG(swapMemUtil), AVG(freeMemKB), AVG(bufMemKB), AVG(cacheMemKB), AVG(swapInRate), AVG(swapOutRate),AVG(swapRate),AVG(freeSwapMemKB)

Report.Name: Top Unix Servers By Swap Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the unix devices by average swap memory utilization

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Performance Incidents and Devices By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the performance related incidents and affected devices by count

Report.Name: Events: Top Performance Event Types By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the performance related events and affected devices by count

Report.Name: Top Network Devices By Errors
Report.Description: Ranks the network devices by the number of reported errors

Report.Name: Top Servers By Errors
Report.Description: Ranks the servers by the number of reported errors

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Performance Incident Categories By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the availability related incident categories by count

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Performance Incident Severities By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the performance related incident severities by count

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Business Services By Performance Incident Count
Report.Description: Ranks business services by the count of performance related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND bizService != "" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_PERF)

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Business Service Devices By Performance Incident Count
Report.Description: Ranks devices (that belong to business services) by the count of performance related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND bizService != "" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_PERF)

Report.Name: Top Servers By CPU, Memory Util, Available Disk space
Report.Description: Ranks servers by average cpu utilization over a window and also presents memory utilization.

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: (eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_SYS_CPU_UTIL","PH_DEV_MON_SYS_MEM_UTIL") OR (eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_DISK_UTIL" AND diskName NOT IN ("/boot"))) AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)

Report.Name: Top Network Devices By CPU, Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks network devices by average cpu utilization over a window and also presents memory utilization.

Report.Name: Top Devices By Performance Efficiency Index
Report.Description: Ranks all network devices and servers by performance efficiency index. A device is considered 100 pct (resp 75 pct, 50 pct) performance efficient if there are no performance incidents (resp medium severity incidents, high severity incidents). These considerations are rolled up in an index (called the Performance Efficiency Index) and this report captures the performance index of every monitored device in FortiSIEM.

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, 100.0 *(0.5 * SUM(durationHostCrit) + 0.75 * SUM(durationHostWarn) + SUM(durationHostNormal))/ SUM(pollIntv) "Perf Eff Index", SUM(durationHostCrit) "Critical Duration", SUM(durationHostWarn) "Degraded Duration", SUM(durationHostNormal) "Healthy Duration", SUM(pollIntv) "Measured Duration"

Report.Name: Events: Total Event Rate (Per Sec)
Report.Description: Provides the statistics of the total number of received events over a window

Report.Name: System Event Processing Statistics
Report.Description: This report provides detailed FortiSIEM event handling statistics: incoming, forwarded, dropped by policy and dropped by license

Report.Name: System Disk Usage
Report.Description: Provides the total disk space used by events and event management. Includes the storage of raw events, indices, queries, reports and incidents. CMDB is not included.

Report.Name: Top Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the events by the number of times they have occurred in a given time period.

Report.Name: Top Event Categories By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the event categories by the number of times they have occurred in a given time period.

Report.Name: Top Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the events by first their severity and then by their count. The severity information can be used to prioritize the events.

Report.Name: Top Performance Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the events by first their severity and then by their count. The severity information can be used to prioritize the events.

Report.Name: Top External Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the events by first their severity and then by their count. The severity information can be used to prioritize the events.

Report.Name: All Received Events
Report.Description: Tracks all events received from monitored devices

Report.Name: Top Internal Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the internal events by the number of times they have occurred in a given time period.

Report.Name: Top Internal Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the internal events by first their severity and then by their count. The severity information can be used to prioritize the events.

Report.Name: Top Reporting Modules By Event Rate (Per Sec)
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting device modules by sent events per second

Report.Name: Top Reporting Devices By Event Rate
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting devices by sent events per second

Report.Name: Top Reporting Devices By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting devices and applications by total number of sent events

Report.Name: Top Reporting Modules, Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting devices and events first by count

Report.Name: Top Reporting Modules, Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the reporting devices and events first by their severity and then by their received event count. This report can be used to identify devices that are sending higher severity events.

Report.Name: All Non-reporting Modules
Report.Description: Tracks the device modules that are not reporting in the given time window

Report.Name: Top Src IP By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the Source IP Addresses found in events by count

Report.Name: Top Src IP, Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses and event types first by severity and then by count. This report can be used to isolate sources that are sending higher severity events

Report.Name: Top Dest IP By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the destination IP addresses by event count

Report.Name: Top Dest IP, Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the destination IP addresses and their events first by event severity and then by count. This report can be used to isolate destination addresses that are receiving higher severity events.

Report.Name: Top TCP/UDP Ports By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the TCP/UDP ports by the number of received events on that port

Report.Name: Top TCP/UDP Ports, Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the TCP/UDP services first by their severity and then by their count. This report can be used to identify services that are sending higher severity events.

Report.Name: Top Network Connections, Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks source IP, destination IP, TCP/UDP ports, reporting devices and event types first by event severity and then by event count.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto, destIpPort, reptDevIpAddr, eventType,eventSeverity

Report.Name: Top non-(TCP,UDP) Protocols By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the non-TCP/UDP protocols by the number of received events on that port

Report.Name: Top non-TCP/UDP Network Conns, Events, Reporting IP, By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks source IP, destination IP, non-TCP/UDP ports, reporting devices and event types first by event severity and then by event count

Report.Name: Top ICMP Connections By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks source IP, destination IP, reporting devices and event types for ICMP connections, first by event severity and then by event count.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.GroupByAttr: srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto, icmpType, icmpCode, reptDevIpAddr, eventType,eventSeverity

Report.Name: Monitored Airlines
Report.Description: Counts monitored airlines in a time window

Report.Name: Monitored Aircrafts
Report.Description: Counts monitored aircrafts in a time window

Report.Name: Airlines Events
Report.Description: Counts total number of events accross all airlines in the Global View and a specific airline in the Local View.

Report.Name: Airline Errors
Report.Description: Counts total number of error events

Report.Name: Top Airlines By Monitored Planes
Report.Description: Enumerates monitored airlines in a time window

Report.Name: Top Airlines By Events
Report.Description: Ranks all airlines by total number of events

Report.Name: Top Airlines By Audit Events
Report.Description: Ranks all airlines by total number of auditable events - Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Top Airlines By Error Events
Report.Description: Ranks all airlines by total number of error events

Report.Name: Top Airline Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks all events by count accross all airlines and aircrafts in the global view and accross all aircrafts for a specific airline in the Local view

Report.Name: Top Airline Audit Events By Count
Report.Description: Ranks all airline audit events by count accross all airlines and aircrafts in the global view and accross all aircrafts for a specific airline in the Local view. Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Top Audit Events and Airlines By Count
Report.Description: Ranks all airline audit events and airline by count. Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Top Audit Events, Airline and Aircrafts By Count
Report.Description: Ranks all airline audit events,airline.tail by count. Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Top Audit Events and Aircrafts By Count
Report.Description: Ranks all airline audit events and aircraft by count. Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Top LRU By Audit Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks all airline LRU by audit event count accross all airlines in the Global view and accross all tail numbers for a specific airlines in the Local view. Audit events include Login failures, all errors, web access failures etc

Report.Name: Airline SSH Activity Before Takeoff
Report.Description: Enumerates SSH Activity before takeoff

Report.Name: Airline SSH Activity After Takeoff
Report.Description: Enumerates SSH Activity after takeoff

Report.Name: Failed Airline SSH Activity
Report.Description: Enumerates all failed SSH activity

Report.Name: Top Airline Users By Web Activity
Report.Description: Ranks users by web activity

Report.Name: Top Flights By Web Activity
Report.Description: Ranks flights by web activity

Report.Name: Top Flights By Errors
Report.Description: Ranks flights by errors - database errors, query execution failures, command execution failures, bad database lookups, missing logs, hardware issues etc.

Report.Name: Airline Video File Errors
Report.Description: Enumerates all video file errors

Report.Name: Airline Database Query Execution Failures
Report.Description: Shows all database query execution failures. Meta data such as flight details and weight on wheels are added

Report.Name: Airline Database Query Errors
Report.Description: Shows all database query errors. Meta data such as flight details and weight on wheels are added

Report.Name: All Airline Incidents
Report.Description: Shows all incidents generated by airline monitoring systems

Report.Name: Top Incidents, Airlines By Count
Report.Description: Ranks incidents, airlines by count

Report.Name: Top Incidents, Aircrafts By Count
Report.Description: Ranks incidents and aircrafts by count

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Reporting Firewalls By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by the number of events sent

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Config Changes Detected From Log
Report.Description: This report provides details about router config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a firewall's running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router/Switch Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about firewall admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about router admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall NAT Translations
Report.Description: This report captures the NAT translations over a time window

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Outbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Inbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted Connections Between Internet and Web DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the permitted connections between Internet and Web DMZ

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND ((srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)))

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted Connections Between Web DMZ and App DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the permitted connections between Web DMZ and App DMZ

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND ((srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB)))

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Permitted Connections Between App DMZ and DB DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the permitted connections between App DMZ and DB DMZ

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND ((srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP)))

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Unauthorized Permitted Connections to Web DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the unauthorized permitted connections involving Web DMZ. This assumes that there are certain protocols allowed between Internet and Web DMZ, between Web DMZ and App DMZ and between Inside and Web DMZ. This report captures the traffic that violates these conditions.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND ((srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_INTERNET_TO_WEBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_WEBDMZ_TO_INTERNET)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_WEBDMZ_TO_APPDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_APPDMZ_TO_WEBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_INSIDE_TO_WEBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_WEBDMZ_TO_INSIDE)))

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Unauthorized Permitted Connections to App DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the permitted connections involving Web DMZ. This assumes that there are certain protocols allowed between Web DMZ and App DMZ, between App DMZ and DB DMZ and between Inside and App DMZ. This report captures the traffic that violates these conditions.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND ((srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_WEBDMZ_TO_APPDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_WEB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_APPDMZ_TO_WEBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_APPDMZ_TO_DBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_DBDMZ_TO_APPDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_INSIDE_TO_APPDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_APPDMZ_TO_INSIDE)))

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Unauthorized Permitted Connections to DB DMZ By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the permitted connections involving DB DMZ. This assumes that there are certain protocols allowed between App DMZ and DB DMZ, and between Inside and DB DMZ. This report captures the traffic that violates these conditions.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND ((srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_APPDMZ_TO_DBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_APP) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_DBDMZ_TO_APPDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_INSIDE_TO_DBDMZ)) OR (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_DMZ_DB) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_INSIDE) AND destIpPort NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_PROTOGRP_DBDMZ_TO_INSIDE)))

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top Reporting Security Management Servers
Report.Description: Ranks Security Management Servers by events received

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate Spyware found on a device Host Anti-virus solutions failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures hosts with malware found by host anti-virus solutions

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top IPs with Malware Found By IPS and Firewalls
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top IPs with Malware Found By Antivirus and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NoncompliantHost) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x,10.x: Detailed Successful Login At PCI Device
Report.Description: Captures detailed successful logins at any device or application including servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Domain Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report details windows domain account lockouts

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Domain Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on domain accounts. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726")

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevName IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650", "Win-Security-4732","Win-Security-4746") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Added To Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-632", "Win-Security-655","Win-Security-660", "Win-Security-665", "Win-Security-4728", "Win-Security-4751","Win-Security-4756", "Win-Security-4761") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Deleted From Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-637", "Win-Security-651","Win-Security-4733", "Win-Security-4747") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Deleted From Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-633", "Win-Security-656","Win-Security-661", "Win-Security-666","Win-Security-4729", "Win-Security-4752","Win-Security-4757", "Win-Security-4762") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures local group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-638", "Win-Security-652","Win-Security-4734", "Win-Security-4748") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-639", "Win-Security-649","Win-Security-4735", "Win-Security-4745") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648","Win-Security-4731", "Win-Security-4744") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures global group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663", "Win-Security-4727", "Win-Security-4749","Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667", "Win-Security-4730", "Win-Security-4753","Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664", "Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Detailed Failed Login At PCI System
Report.Description: Captures detailed failed logins at any device or application - servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI))

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI))

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Link Module Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device miscellaneous module (e.g. fan, power etc.) down/up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_OtherModuleDown) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Errors
Report.Description: Tracks errors reported by network device

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Windows System Clock Change
Report.Description: Tracks system clock changes on windows systems

Report.Description: Ranks System Admin Users By Successful Logon Count

Report.Name: Logon: Top System Admin Users Ranked By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks System Admin Users By Failed Logon Count

Report.Description: Details all System Admin User Logon Attempts

Report.Name: Logon: All System Admin User Object Modification Activity
Report.Description: Details all System Admin user object modification activities

Report.Name: Logon: Top System Admin User Object Modification Activity
Report.Description: Ranks System Admin user object modification activities

Report.Name: Logon: System User Lockouts
Report.Description: Details all System Admin User Logon Attempts

Report.Name: Maintenance: System Maintenance Window Changes
Report.Description: Reports all maintenance window activity

Report.Name: CMDB: Device Modification History
Report.Description: Details the history of device attribute changed in CMDB

Report.Name: CMDB: Device Addition and Deletion History
Report.Description: Details the history of devices getting added and deleted from CMDB

Report.Name: CMDB: Complete Device Modification History
Report.Description: Details the history of devices getting added, deleted from CMDB

Report.Name: Discovery: Device Discovery Merge History
Report.Description: Captures two discovered devices with distinct host names getting merged because of overlapping IP addresses

Report.Name: CMDB: Scheduled Malware Knowledge-base Update History
Report.Description: Captures scheduled malware updates

Report.Name: CMDB: System User added
Report.Description: Records all system user creation activity

Report.Name: CMDB: System User Password modification
Report.Description: Records all system user password modification

Report.Name: SSH Tunnel Open/Close History
Report.Description: Records all SSH tunnel open/close history. Tunnels are opened between FortiSIEM collector and super to enable FortiSIEM organization users to connect to their devices behind firewalls.

Report.Name: User Initiated Performance Monitoring Job Status Changes
Report.Description: Records all user initiated performance monitoring job status changes

OrderByClause.AttrList: customer ASC, hostName ASC, phRecvTime DESC

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 2 AND eventType = "PH_AUDIT_DEV_MON_JOB_STATUS_CHANGE" AND jobStatusType IN ("UserDeletedDevice", "UserDisabledDevice", "UserDisabledJob", "UserEnabledJob", "UserChangedPollIntv", "UserEnabledDevice")

Report.Name: Discovery Removed/Not-scheduled Performance Monitoring Jobs
Report.Description: Records all discovery removed or not-scheduled performance monitoring jobs

OrderByClause.AttrList: customer ASC, hostName ASC, phRecvTime DESC

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 2 AND eventType = "PH_AUDIT_DEV_MON_JOB_STATUS_CHANGE" AND jobStatusType IN ("DiscoveryRemoved", "DiscoveryNotScheduled")

Report.Name: Performance Monitoring Job Execution Failures
Report.Description: Records all failed performance monitoring jobs. Note that event is generated when the job first failed.

OrderByClause.AttrList: customer ASC, hostName ASC, phRecvTime DESC

Report.Name: Beaconing Customer: System Event Processing Statistics
Report.Description: This report provides detailed FortiSIEM event handling statistics for each customer: incoming, forwarded, dropped by policy and dropped by license

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: System Event Processing Statistics
Report.Description: This report ranks FortiSIEM customers by handled event rate and provides other details

Report.Description: Ranks the incidents by first their severity and then by their count.

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By Incident Severity, Count

Report.Description: This reports failed monitoring jobs for all customers

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Discovery Errors

Report.Description: Errors reported by FortiSIEM

SubPattern.name: Filter_PH_1

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: System Operational Errors
Report.Description: Errors reported by FortiSIEM

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By System Operational Errors

Report.Description: This report captures dropped incidents that can result from various reasons: (a)device is in maintenance window, (b) too many incidents for the same rule, (c)rule exceptions, (d)device is not in Approved device list while the trigger on Approved device setting is on.

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Incidents Dropped
Report.Description: This report captures dropped incidents that can result from various reasons: (a)device is in maintenance window, (b) too many incidents for the same rule, (c)rule exceptions, (d)device is not in Approved device list while the trigger on Approved device settiing is on.

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By Incidents Dropped
Report.Description: This report captures top customers by dropped incidents. An incident can be dropped for various reasons: (a)device is in maintenance window, (b) too many incidents for the same rule, (c)rule exceptions, (d)device is not in Approved device list while the trigger on Approved device settiing is on.

Report.Description: Ranks CMDB device types (vendor, model, version) by count

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By CMDB Device Count
Report.Description: Ranks FortiSIEM customers By total number of CMDB devices

Report.Description: Ranks FortiSIEM customers By total number of successful performance monitoring jobs

SubPattern.name: Filter_BEACON_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_BEACON_CMDB_PERF_MON_STAT" AND phEventCategory = 7 AND jobStatusType = "Execution Successful"

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By Failed Performance Monitor Job Count
Report.Description: Ranks FortiSIEM customers By total number of successful performance monitoring jobs

SubPattern.name: Filter_BEACON_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_BEACON_CMDB_PERF_MON_STAT" AND phEventCategory = 7 AND (jobStatusType != "Execution Successful" AND jobStatusType != "Discovery Removed")

Report.Name: Beaconing Cloud: Top Customers By Failed Performance Monitor Job Names
Report.Description: Ranks FortiSIEM customers By total number of successful performance monitoring jobs

SubPattern.name: Filter_BEACON_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_BEACON_CMDB_PERF_MON_STAT" AND phEventCategory = 7 AND (jobStatusType != "Execution Successful" AND jobStatusType != "Discovery Removed")

SubPattern.name: Filter_PH_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 3 AND rawEventMsg CONTAIN "PHL_ERROR" AND rawEventMsg NOT CONTAIN "PH_DISCOV*"

Report.Name: Top FortiSIEM System Operational Errors

SubPattern.name: Filter_PH_1
