Report.Name: Successful FortiSIEM Discoveries
Report.Description: This reports successful discoveries by the FortiSIEM system

Report.Name: FortiSIEM Discovery Errors
Report.Description: This report tracks the errors during PH Discovery operation. The errors could be caused by bad credentials or unsupported device types or merely internal errors in the PH system.

Report.Name: Skipped or Significant Failed FortiSIEM Discoveries
Report.Description: This report tracks PH discoveries which either completely failed or a significant sub-discovery completely failed. Examples are basic SNMP discovery failure, Host Resources discovery failure, Layer 2 discovery failure, Active Directory discovery failure etc. A discovery can be skipped by user defined policy by including a host in exclude discovery list or by not including in include discovery list

Report.Name: FortiSIEM Event Parsing Errors
Report.Description: This report lists the events that were not parsed correctly

Report.Name: Top reporting devices by event parsing errors
Report.Description: This summary report ranks the reporting devices by the number of events with parsing errors

Report.Name: Successful Layer 2 Discovery Details
Report.Description: This report displays the hosts and their discovered current switch port location

Report.Name: Successful Layer 2 Discoveries
Report.Description: This report displays the successfully L2 discovered switches and the number of hosts directly attached to the switches

Report.Name: Failed Layer 2 Discoveries
Report.Description: This report displays the switches where Layer2 discovery failed along with the reason for failure

Report.Name: Failed CMDB Device Discoveries
Report.Description: This reports identifies failed discoveries of existing CMDB devices

Report.Name: Successful Monitoring Jobs
Report.Description: This reports successful monitoring jobs

SubPattern.name: Filter_PH_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_JOB_STAT" AND (jobStatus = 0 OR jobStatus = 3) AND phEventCategory = 3

Report.Name: Failed Monitoring Jobs
Report.Description: This reports failed monitoring jobs

SubPattern.name: Filter_PH_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_JOB_STAT" AND (jobStatus = 1 OR jobStatus = 2) AND phEventCategory = 3

Report.Name: Successful Monitoring Jobs Falling Behind
Report.Description: This reports successful monitoring jobs that are behinf schedule

Report.Name: Devices not added to CMDB because of license restrictions
Report.Description: This report tracks devices that are not added to CMDB because of license limitations

Report.Name: All Incident Notifications
Report.Description: This report tracks incident notifications (both successful and failed)

Report.Name: All Report Notifications
Report.Description: This report tracks report notifications (both successful and failed)

Report.Name: Successful Event Database Archive Actions
Report.Description: This report tracks successful event database archive operations

Report.Name: Failed EventDB Archive/Purge Actions
Report.Description: This report tracks failed event database archive and archive purge operations

Report.Name: Successful EventDB Archive (Policy based) Purge Actions
Report.Description: This report tracks successful event database archive purge operations driven by purge policy

Report.Name: Successful EventDB Archive (Low Space) Purge Actions
Report.Description: This report tracks successful event database archive purge operations caused by low available archive space

Report.Name: Incidents Dropped
Report.Description: This report captures dropped incidents that can result from various reasons: (a)device is in maintenance window, (b) too many incidents for the same rule, (c)rule exceptions, (d)device is not in Approved device list while the trigger on Approved device settiing is on.

Report.Name: Successful Rule Updates
Report.Description: This report captures successful rule updates

Report.Name: Events Dropped From Shared Buffer
Report.Description: This report captures rule worker dropping events from shared buffer - this indicates either a overloaded condition indicating ruleworker can not keep up or event timestamps are 15minutes behind the current time

Report.Name: REST API calls to Supervisor
Report.Description: This report captures all the REST API calls to the Supervisor

Report.Name: Top Internal Modules by Log Count
Report.Description: This report ranks internal modules by log count

Report.Name: Successful Policy based Event Retention Activity
Report.Description: This report tracks successful policy based event retention activity.

Report.Name: Failed Policy based Event Retention Activity
Report.Description: This report tracks failed policy based event retention activity.

Report.Name: Event Retention Policy Definition Violations
Report.Description: This report tracks event retention policy violations due to low archive space or conflicting offline policies

Report.Name: Event Retention Policy Execution Time
Report.Description: This report tracks event retention policy execution times

Report.Name: Printer Output Status
Report.Description: Captures printer status

Report.Name: Top Printers By Supply Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks printers by supply utilization

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, hostIpAddr, prtSupplyName, prtSupplyType, AVG(prtCurrSupplyUsedPct), MAX(prtMaxSupplyLevel), MIN(prtMaxSupplyLevel)

Report.Name: Top Printers By Printed Page Count
Report.Description: Ranks printers by printed pages

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of successful logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin IP, Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of successful logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin Users By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin IP, Users By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches By Event Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches By Event Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType NOT CONTAIN "PH_DEV_MON"

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches and External Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches and Events By Severity, Count. This exclude system generated monitoring events.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType NOT CONTAIN "PH_DEV_MON"

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches and System Generated Monitoring Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches and Events By Severity, Count

Report.Name: All Events: Router Non-flow Event Details
Report.Description: This report provides details about all non-flow router events

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_RegularTraffic)

Report.Name: Change: Router Configuration Changes Detected From Log

Report.Name: Change: Router Run versus Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

Report.Name: Change: Router Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected configuration changes via login

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Conversations By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top connections by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Conversations By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top connections by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Description: This report ranks the top source IPs by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Description: This report ranks the top source IPs and destionation ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Destination IPs By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top destination IPs by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Description: This report ranks the top destination IPs and ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Protocols By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top protocols by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Protocols By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top protocol and destination ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Router Interface By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top router link usage by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetflowTraffic)

Report.Description: Ranks countries by destined traffic connections, bytes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Logon: Router Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about router admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Router Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

Report.Name: Performance: Top Routers Ranked By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Router Network Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the routers and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Routers By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: Availability: Router/Switch Ping Monitor Statistics
Report.Description: Tracks the PING response times and packet loss for the monitored devices

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, hostIpAddr, AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Avg RTT (sec)",MIN(minDurationMSec) "Min RTT", MAX(maxDurationMSec) "Max RTT", AVG(pktLossPct) "Avg Pkt Loss(%)"

Report.Name: Availability: Router Network Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device interface down and up events

Report.Name: Availability: Router Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH))

Report.Name: Availability: Router/Switch Failover
Report.Description: Tracks router/switch failovers

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Classmaps by drop pct
Report.Description: Ranks interface classmaps by drop pct

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Police Actions by conformance
Report.Description: Ranks interface police actions by drop pct

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Queue Stats by discarded packets
Report.Description: Ranks interface queues by discarded packets

Report.Name: Routing: OSPF Neighbor status
Report.Description: Provides OSPF neighbor status

Report.Name: Routing: BGP Neighbor status
Report.Description: Provides BGP neighbor status

Report.Name: Hardware: Top Cisco IOS modules by max temperature offset
Report.Description: Lists all Cisco IOS modules ranked by offset from maximun temperature in ascending order.Requires CISCO_ENV_MIB support. Includes Cisco IOS.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_HW_TEMP" AND reptVendor = "Cisco" AND reptModel IN ("IOS", "NX-OS")

Report.Name: Hardware: Top JunOS modules by temperature
Report.Description: Lists all JunOS modules ranked by temperature

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_HW_TEMP" AND reptVendor = "Juniper" AND reptModel IN ("JunOS", "SRX JunOS")

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers and switches by system uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)"

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers/switches by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH)

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers and switches by network ping uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Business Hours Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers/switches by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH)

Report.Name: Top Router Interfaces by Days-since-last-use
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch interfaces by days since last use

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 0

Report.Name: Top Routers By Interfaces Unused for more than 90 days
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch by the number of interfaces that have not been used for more than 90 days

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 90

Report.Name: Top Router Interfaces by days-since-last-use at least 90 days
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch unused interfaces by days since last use. An interface is unused if it has not seen traffic in the last 90 days.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 90

Report.Name: SANS CC1: CMDB Device Addition and Deletion History
Report.Description: Details the history of devices getting added and deleted from CMDB

Report.Name: SANS CC1: CMDB Device Modification History
Report.Description: Details the history of device attribute changed in CMDB

Report.Name: SANS CC3: Change Mgmt: Audited Linux file changes
Report.Description: Tracks user modifications to Linux files and directories. Both the content and attribute modifications are captured. For actions on directories, the affected files in the directories are also captured.

Report.Name: SANS CC3: Change Mgmt: Windows Server Config Modification Details
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server configuration or policy modification events. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC3: Change Mgmt: Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC3: Change Mgmt: Windows File Access Successes
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access successes. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564","Win-Security-4656") AND eventAction = 0 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC4: Host vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: This report details the host vulnerabilties found by scanners like Qualys, Nessus, nCircle etc

Report.Name: SANS CC4: Top Hosts with Vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: Ranks the hosts by vulnerabilities found by scanners

Report.Name: SANS CC4: Host vulnerability found by scanners with details
Report.Description: Details the vulnerabilities discovered on hosts

Report.Name: SANS CC4: Top OS types with vulnerabilities
Report.Description: Ranks OS types by vulnerabilities found

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Virus found and remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found and remediated

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Spyware found and remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware that Host Antivirus found and remediated

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5:: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Ranks computers by the number of malware (virus, spyware, botnet etc) found by host anti-virus

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Inbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on inbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Outbound Malware Found At the Boundary By IPS, Firewalls and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Reports on outbound malware detected at the trust/untrust boundary by edge devices such as IPS devices, Firewalls and Security Gateways.

SubPattern.name: Filter_GPG
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL, Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Mail dropped by Anti-virus
Report.Description: Records all mail that tested positive for Anti-virus but was dropped

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Mail quarantined for Spam
Report.Description: Records all mail that was quarantined for suspicion of spam

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Mail dropped by filter
Report.Description: Records all mail that was dropped by a configured filter

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Traffic Dropped by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Traffic denied by Cisco ASA Botnet filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338005","ASA-338006","ASA-338007","ASA-338008","ASA-338203","ASA-338204") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Traffic Permitted by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Traffic permitted by Cisco ASA Botnet filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338001","ASA-338002","ASA-338003","ASA-338004","ASA-338101","ASA-338102", "ASA-338103","ASA-338104","ASA-338201","ASA-338202") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Infected Source IPs detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Infected Source IP addresses detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338001","ASA-338003","ASA-338005","ASA-338007","ASA-338201","ASA-338203") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Infected Destination IPs detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter
Report.Description: Infected Source IP addresses detected by Cisco ASA Botnet Filter

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("ASA-338002","ASA-338004","ASA-338006","ASA-338008","ASA-338202","ASA-338204") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Filtered Inbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total inbound spam denied by spam filtering policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_18
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Filtered Outbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total outbound spam denied by policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Mail Security Gateway Actions By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the actions taken by the mail security gateway - actions include blocking an inbound/outbound mail gateway because of RBL or other SMTP violations, blocking a mail because of spam or other policy violations and delivering a mail

SubPattern.name: Filter_MAIL_GW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitMailTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Queried Domain Names
Report.Description: Ranks the queried domain names by the number of name resolution requests

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top DNS Query Types
Report.Description: Top DNS query types

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top DNS Requesters, DNS Servers By Uncommon DNS Query Count
Report.Description: Ranks IP addresses making uncommon DNS queries and the DNS servers by the total count of such queries. Any DNS query other than A and PTR query is considered uncommon

SubPattern.name: Filter_DNS_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DNS_SERVER) AND (eventType CONTAIN "BIND_DNS_" OR eventType CONTAIN "MS_DNS_") AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_CommonDNSTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top DNS Requesters and Resolved Names By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the DNS requesters and the host for whom DNS service is requested by the total number of requests.

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Reporting Security Management Servers
Report.Description: Ranks Security Management Servers by events received

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Reporting Network IPS By Event Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Network IPS Devices By Event Count

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Web Users By Uncommon HTTP Method Connections
Report.Description: Ranks web users by uncommon HTTP methods used

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND httpMethod NOT IN ("GET", "POST") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Top Web Users By HTTP POST Exchanged Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks web clients by HTTP POST byte count - can catch malware sending confidential information out

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW) AND httpStatusCode IN ("200") AND httpMethod = "POST" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: DNS Traffic To Malware Domains
Report.Description: Reports sources that make DNS requests to malware domains

SubPattern.name: Filter_Malware
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destName IN (Group@PH_SYS_MAL_DOMAIN_MDL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_CommonDNSTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: DNS Traffic To Threat Stream Malware Domains
Report.Description: Reports sources that make DNS requests to malware domains

SubPattern.name: Filter_Malware
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destName IN (Group@PH_SYS_MAL_DOMAIN_THREATSTREAM) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_CommonDNSTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Traffic To Emerging Threat IP List
Report.Description: Reports sources that communicates to Emerging Threat IP List

SubPattern.name: Filter_Malware
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_EMER_THREAT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Traffic To Zeus Malware IP List
Report.Description: Reports sources that communicates to Emerging Threat Shadow server List

SubPattern.name: Filter_Malware
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_ZEUS_BLOCKED_IP) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC5: Traffic To Threat Stream Malware IP List
Report.Description: Reports sources that communicates to Threat Stream IP List

SubPattern.name: Filter_Malware
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_THREATSTREAM_BLOCKED_IP) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC7: Rogue APs detected
Report.Description: Lists the rogue APs

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessRogue) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC7: WLAN Config Change
Report.Description: This report tracks all software, hardware and device configuration changes at WLAN Access points and Base stations. The report includes Original Reporting Controller IP, Event Type and MAC address of the AP or Controller where the event happened. If the MAC address is empty then, the event happened at the reporting Controller.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC7: Top WLAN IDS Alerts (Detailed)
Report.Description: Ranks WLAN IDS alerts

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessSig) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC10: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC10: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC10: Router/Switch Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC10: Router/Switch Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Permitted Outbound Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Permitted Inbound Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Sources, Services, Destinations Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC11: Top Blocked Internal Destinations, Services Ranked By Connection Count
Report.Description: Ranks blocked Internal Destinations, Services Ranked By Connection Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed Router Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful Router Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful Firewall Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed Firewall Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Windows Server Account Unlocks
Report.Description: Captures account unlocks on windows servers. Account unlocks happen after lockouts that may happen on repeated login failures

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_44
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: Provides details about a successful domain authentication

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed Windows Domain Authentications
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Successful Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Failed Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12:: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12:: Successful Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by successful privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12:: Failed Unix Privilege Escalations
Report.Description: This report ranks the UNIX servers and their users by failed privilege escalations (su) count

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC12: Unix Privileged Command Executions
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Computers added to domain
Report.Description: Captures computers added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-645","Win-Security-4741") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Computers deleted from domain
Report.Description: Captures computers removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-647","Win-Security-4743") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts created
Report.Description: Captures user accounts added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts deleted
Report.Description: Captures user accounts removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630","Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain user accounts modified
Report.Description: Captures domain user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain groups created
Report.Description: Captures domain group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-653", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727","Win-Security-4749", "Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain groups deleted
Report.Description: Captures domain group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-657", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730","Win-Security-4753", "Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Domain groups modified
Report.Description: Captures domain group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-654", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737","Win-Security-4750", "Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760" ) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Local Windows User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Audited Linux file changes
Report.Description: Tracks user modifications to Linux files and directories. Both the content and attribute modifications are captured. For actions on directories, the affected files in the directories are also captured.

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Windows Domain Controller Config Changes
Report.Description: Provides detailed windows domain controller config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Change Mgmt: Windows Server Config Modification Details
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server configuration or policy modification events. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: All VMWare VCenter Account/Group Change Events
Report.Description: This report lists all account/group change events

SubPattern.name: Filter_VMware_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND vmwEventCat IS NOT NULL AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Domain User Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Windows Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: SANS CC16: Unix User Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks user password changes in Unix systems

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SANSCC)

Report.Name: Top Security Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the security related events by first their severity and then by their count

Report.Name: Top Security Event Severities By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the security related event severties by count

Report.Name: Top Security Event Categories By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the security event categories by count

Report.Name: Top Audit Event Categories By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the audit event categories by count. Audit events include logon, change and availability related events.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Change,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Logon,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SuspiciousLogon,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DeviceStatus) AND eventType NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_OtherDeviceStatus)

Report.Name: Top Security Event Reporting IPs By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the devices reporting security event by count

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Business Services By Security Incidents
Report.Description: Ranks business services by the count of security related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND bizService != "" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_SEC)

Report.Name: Incidents: Top Business Service Devices By Security Incidents
Report.Description: Ranks devices (that belong to business services) by the number of security related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND bizService != "" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_SEC)

Report.Name: Dormant User Accounts
Report.Description: This report captures dormat user accounts - that are active but not used for more than 30 days

Report.Name: User Accounts With Stale Passwords
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts where passwords have not been changed for more than 90 days

Report.Name: User Accounts With Never Expiring Passwords
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts where passwords never expire.

Report.Name: User Accounts With Passwords Not Required
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts where passwords are not required

Report.Name: User Accounts Set to Expire in 2 Weeks
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts set to expire in 2 weeks

Report.Name: Disabled User Accounts
Report.Description: This report captures disabled user accounts

Report.Name: Successful Domain Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful domain logins

Report.Name: Failed Domain Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed domain logins

Report.Name: Successful Windows Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful windows logins

Report.Name: Successful Unix Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful Unix server logins

Report.Name: Successful AWS Windows Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful windows logins

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Successful AWS Unix Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful Unix server logins

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Failed Windows Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed Windows logins

Report.Name: Failed Unix Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed unix server logins

Report.Name: Failed AWS Windows Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed Windows logins

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Failed AWS Unix Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed unix server logins

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_AWS_EC2_Compute)

Report.Name: Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report ranks users getting locked out from servers

Report.Name: Account Lockout
Report.Description: This report ranks users getting locked out from any devices

Report.Name: Successful Network Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by successful logins to a network device

Report.Name: Failed Network Login
Report.Description: This report ranks users by failed logins to a network device

Report.Name: SharePoint Audit Trail Integrity Report
Report.Description: This report lists all events with potential impact to audit trail integrity including any changes to the audit policy that defines which types of security events are logged as well as deletion of log records.

Report.Name: SharePoint Group Changes
Report.Description: This report lists all events that could result in a user being granted more or less authority to objects in SharePoint. This report is for group changes.

Report.Name: SharePoint Unique Permission Changes
Report.Description: This report lists all events that could result in a user being granted more or less authority to objects in SharePoint. This report is for unique permissions change.

Report.Name: SharePoint Permission Changes
Report.Description: This report lists all events that could result in a user being granted more or less authority to objects in SharePoint. This report is for permissions change.

Report.Name: SharePoint Permission level Changes
Report.Description: This report lists all events that could result in a user being granted more or less authority to objects in SharePoint. This report is for permission level changes.

Report.Name: SharePoint Site Collection Administrator Changes
Report.Description: This report lists all events that could result in a user being granted more or less authority to objects in SharePoint. This report is for site collection administrator changes.

Report.Name: SharePoint Document Updates
Report.Description: This report lists document level access events except for view events.

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("Win-Security-LOGbndSC-13","Win-Security-LOGbndSC-14","Win-Security-LOGbndSC-43") OR ( eventType = "Win-Security-LOGbndSC-19" AND objType = "Document" )

Report.Name: SharePoint List Updates
Report.Description: This report lists SharePoint audit events concerning updates to Lists and List Items and List Item deleted.

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN ("Win-Security-LOGbndSC-44","Win-Security-LOGbndSC-45") OR ( eventType = "Win-Security-LOGbndSC-19" AND objType = "List Item" )

Report.Name: SharePoint Container Object Updates
Report.Description: This report lists SharePoint audit events concerning updates to site collections, webs, document libraries and folders.

Report.Name: SharePoint Child Object Changes
Report.Description: This report lists SharePoint audit events for certain change operations dealing with various object types: Child object deleted, Child object moved.

Report.Name: SharePoint Object Changes
Report.Description: This report lists SharePoint audit events for certain change operations dealing with various object types: Object copied, Object deleted, Object moved.

Report.Name: SharePoint Generic Object Changes
Report.Description: This report lists SharePoint audit events for certain change operations dealing with various object types: Object profile changed, SharePoint object structure changed, Object restored, List item updated and Workflow accessed. These event types are not object type specific. To limit the report to specific operations, filter on event type or to research a specific object, filter the description on portions of the objects title, description or URL.

Report.Name: SharePoint Objects Viewed
Report.Description: This report lists view events for document libraries, documents, lists and other objects.

Report.Name: SharePoint Searches
Report.Description: This report provides an audit trail of search queries executed by users.

Report.Name: SharePoint Import and Export
Report.Description: This report lists export and import events of SharePoint objects.

Report.Name: SharePoint Information Management Policy Changes
Report.Description: This report lists changes to Information Management Policy.

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4): Successful Database Server Logons
Report.Description: Captures successful database server logons

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4): Failed Database Server Logons
Report.Description: Captures failed database server logons

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4,DS4.x): Top Applications By Response Time
Report.Description: Ranks the services by average application level probe response times

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4): Top App Servers By Current Uptime
Report.Description: Ranks App servers by current uptime (i.e. time since last reboot)

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4,DS4.x): Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.4,DS4.x): Server Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks server network interface down and up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (AI2.5): Server Installed Software Changes
Report.Description: This report captures detected installed software changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_INST_SW") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Devices By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Devices By Memory Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Devices By Disk Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Firewalls By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by average connection count over a window. The ratio of the connection count to the max connection count since startup is also provided. If the ratio is close 1 and the firewall is up for a long time, the the firewall must be busy from a firewalled connection point of view.

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Device Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the devices and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Server Apps By CPU, Mem Util
Report.Description: Ranks the server processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Server) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top Network Device Processes By CPU, Mem Util
Report.Description: Ranks the host processes by average cpu utilization over a window

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PROC_RESOURCE_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): Top App Servers By CPU Usage With Other Performance Metrics
Report.Description: Ranks App servers by the amount of CPU usage - this report provides details on other performance aspects such as memory, threads and classes

SelectClause.AttrList: reptDevIpAddr,AVG(cpuUtil),MAX(cpuUtil), AVG(heapUtil),MAX(heapUtil), AVG(nonHeapUtil),MAX(nonHeapUtil), AVG(liveThreads), MAX(liveThreadsMax), AVG(loadedClasses)

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): All Availability Incidents
Report.Description: Captures the availability incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_AVAIL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS5.6): Performance Incidents
Report.Description: Captures the performance related incidents

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_PERF) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS3.x): All devices under performance monitoring
Report.Description: Captures all devices under performance monitoring

Report.Name: SOX (DS5.4): Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Name: SOX (DS5.4,PCI1.x)): Domain Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on domain accounts. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_SOX)

Report.Description: Tracks password changes
